context: Water is a compound that consists of hydrogen and oxygen. Elements like hydrogen and oxygen are fundamental to chemistry.

concepts.name: Compound
concepts.justification: It can encompass various examples such as water, carbon dioxide, etc.

concepts.name: Water
concepts.justification: It is a specific instance of a compound
concepts.information: Water consists of hydrogen and oxygen.

concepts.name: Element
concepts.justification: It includes examples like hydrogen, oxygen, etc.
concepts.information: Elements like hydrogen and oxygen are fundamental to chemistry.

concepts.name: Hydrogen
concepts.information: Hydrogen is a fundamental element in chemistry.

concepts.name: Oxygen
concepts.information: Oxygen is a fundamental element in chemistry.
